vulnerability_findings.name: calls-loop
vulnerability_findings.message:
RealOldFuckMaker.makeOldFucks has external calls inside a loop:
	- ! fuck.call(bytes4(keccak256()(giveBlockReward()))) (patch_9.sol#9-11)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_9.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.16 (patch_9.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in RealOldFuckMaker.makeOldFucks (patch_9.sol#6-13):
	-! fuck.call(bytes4(keccak256()(giveBlockReward()))) patch_9.sol#9-11
